//   -------------------------------- ----- ----

//   DistanceFade                     c14      1

    ps_3_0
    def c1, 1, 0, 9.99999975e-006, 100000
    def c3, -0.0500000007, 3, 5, 4
    def c4, 0.300000012, 0.589999974, 0.109999999, 0.5
    def c5, 0.5, 1.5, 65504, 15
    def c6, 0.25, 0.0078125, 0.001953125, 0.064453125
    def c22, 14.9998999, 0.05859375, 0.234375, 0
    def c23, 1, 2, 3, 0.0625
    def c24, 2, -1, 0, 0
    dcl_texcoord v0.zw
    dcl_texcoord1 v1
    dcl_texcoord2 v2.zw
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3
    dcl_2d s4
    dcl_2d s5
    dcl_2d s6

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s13


// Unreal light shaft fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i -f --git --auto-fix-unreal-light-shafts --only-autofixed CRC32_636EE63_0.txt
texldl r7, c220.z, s13
mov r6, c13 // TextureSpaceBlurOrigin
mad r6.x, r7.x, c220.w, r6.x // Adjust each eye by 1/2 separation

    mov r0.zw, c12
    mad r0.xy, v0.zwzw, -r0.zwzw, r6
    dp2add r0.x, r0, r0, c1.y
    rsq r0.x, r0.x
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    mul_sat r0.x, r0.x, c4.w
    mov r1.xy, c5
    mad r0.y, c11.w, -r1.x, r1.y
    texld_pp r1, v0.zwzw, s2
    mul_pp r0.z, r1.w, r1.w
    mul_pp r1, r1.zzxy, c16.zzxy
    lrp r2.x, r0.z, r0.y, c11.w
    lrp r3.x, r0.x, c1.x, r2.x
    mul r0.x, c14.x, c14.x
    mul r0.x, r0.x, c14.x
    lrp_pp r2.x, r0.x, c1.x, r3.x
    max r0.xy, v1.zwzw, c10
    min r2.yz, c10.xzww, r0.xxyw
    texld r0, r2.yzzw, s5
    add r0.w, r0.w, c3.x
    mul r0.w, r0.w, c3.y
    mov r2.zw, c3
    mul r2.y, r2.z, c0.x
    min r3.x, r2.y, c1.x
    mul_sat r0.w, r0.w, r3.x
    mul r3, c1.xxyy, v1.xyxx
    texldl_pp r3, r3, s0
    lrp_pp r4, r0.w, r0.zzxy, r3.zzxy
    add r0.x, r3.w, -c2.y
    texld r3, v0.zwzw, s1
    mul r3, r3.zzxy, c7.zzxy
    mul_pp r3, r3, c3.w
    dp3_pp r0.y, r4.zwyw, c4
    mul_pp r0.y, r0.y, -c3.y
    exp_pp r0.y, r0.y
    mul_sat_pp r0.z, r0.y, c7.w
    mul_sat_pp r0.y, r0.y, c15.x
    mul r1, r0.y, r1
    mad_pp r3, r3, r0.z, r4
    mul_pp r3, r2.x, r3
    mad_pp r1, r1, c3.w, r3
    mad_pp r0.yzw, r1.xzwy, c9.y, c9.x
    rcp r3.z, r0.y
    rcp r3.w, r0.z
    rcp r3.xy, r0.w
    mul_sat_pp r1, r1, r3
    mul r3.xyw, r1.xwzz, c22.xzzy
    frc r0.y, r3.x
    add r0.y, -r0.y, r3.x
    mad r0.z, r1.y, c5.w, -r0.y
    mad r3.x, r0.y, c23.w, r3.w
    add r0.y, -r0.x, c1.z
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    cmp r0.x, r0.y, c1.w, r0.x
    mul_pp r0.x, r0.x, c2.x
    min_pp r1.x, r0.x, c5.z
    add r4, r1.x, -c21
    cmp_pp r4, r4, c1.y, c1.x
    mov r0.xy, c1
    mad r5, c21.xxyz, -r0.yxxx, r1.x
    mad_sat_pp r1.xyz, r1.x, c20.w, -c20
    cmp_pp r4, r5, r4, c1.y
    dp3_pp r0.y, r4.yzww, c23
    dp3_pp r0.w, r4, r1
    add_pp r1.x, r0.y, c1.x
    mad r2.x, r0.y, c6.x, c6.y
    mad r1.x, r1.x, c6.x, c6.y
    mov r1.yz, c6.xzww
    add r1, r3.xyxy, r1.yxzx
    texld_pp r4, r1, s6
    texld_pp r1, r1.zwzw, s6
    lrp_pp r5, r0.z, r1, r4
    mov r2.yz, c6.xzww
    add r1, r3.xyxy, r2.yxzx
    texld_pp r3, r1, s6
    texld_pp r1, r1.zwzw, s6
    lrp_pp r4, r0.z, r1, r3
    lrp_pp r1, r0.w, r5, r4
    texld r3, v2.zwzw, s4
    dp4_sat r0.y, r3, c19
    add r0.xzw, -r0.x, c18.xyyz
    mad r0.xyz, r0.y, r0.xzww, c1.x
    mad_pp r2.xy, v2.zwzw, r2.w, c17
    texld_pp r2, r2, s3
    mad r0.w, r2.x, c24.x, c24.y
    mul r0.w, r0.w, c8.w
    mad_sat_pp oC0.xyz, r1, r0, r0.w
    mov_pp oC0.w, r1.w

// approximately 90 instruction slots used (11 texture, 79 arithmetic)
